title: Hyperbolic Tangent Function (TANH)
description: This function computes the hyperbolic tangent of a given input X. The function returns 1.0 for values of X greater than 20.0, -1.0 for values of X less than -20.0, and uses the formula 1.0 - 2.0 / (EXP(2.0 * X) + 1.0) for values of X in the range [-20.0, 20.0].
name: TANH

input.name: X
input.description: The input value for which the hyperbolic tangent is to be calculated.

return_value.description: The hyperbolic tangent of the input value X.
